loginPage.heading: Login Page
loginPage.bodyText: This is where you can log into the secure area. Enter tomsmith for the username and SuperSecretPassword! for the password. If the information is wrong you should see error messages.

secureArea.heading: Secure Area
secureArea.bodyText: Welcome to the Secure Area. When you are done click logout below.
secureArea.successfulLoginMessagePrefix: You logged into a secure area!
